Sinopse: From National Lampoon, the masters of raunchy comedy, comes a summer tale of beers, babes, and bros! Gathering his friends and the local surf hero, Mike Mooney, they take a road trip to LA to get the surfboard back, then return to Ventura for the wildest summer party ever!—Anonymous
